welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Meerhout, Belgium! Get ready to discover our quaint town known for its picturesque streets, delicious local cuisine, and friendly locals. Enjoy your stay and make the most out of your visit!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving most international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
